content:
What a score! Congratulations on snagging those Stuart Weitzman ankle boots at a steal!

Those boots sound like a great find, and they could definitely work well with your outfit. Stuart Weitzman is a high-quality brand known for their comfortable and stylish shoes.

Considering your outfit, here are a few things to keep in mind:

* **Color**: Since your top and skirt are both white, you'll want to make sure the boots complement the overall light and airy feel. If the boots are a darker neutral color like black, navy, or dark brown, they might create a nice contrast. If they're a lighter color like beige or gray, they might blend in more with the outfit.
* **Style**: Stuart Weitzman ankle boots often have a sleek, sophisticated design that would work well with your flowy maxi skirt. If the boots have some embellishments or details, they might add a nice touch to your outfit.
* **Heel height**: Since you mentioned you got a great deal, I'm assuming the boots fit well. Make sure the heel height is comfortable for you, especially if you plan to be standing or dancing during your night out.

If you're still unsure, you could try pairing the boots with your outfit and taking a few photos in front of a mirror. This will give you a better sense of how the overall look comes together.

Considering you got such an amazing deal, I'd say give the boots a try with your outfit and see how you feel. If you're not completely sold, you could always try pairing them with other outfits to get more use out of your new boots!
